name: sensorpush
0:
”Alexa, ask sensor push tell me about all sensors”
”Alexa, ask sensor push what is the temperature for backyard”
”Alexa, ask sensor push set preference for temperature to celsius”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sensor push
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Our Humidity & Temperature Smart Sensor pairs effortlessly with our mobile apps and the optional SensorPush G1 WiFi Gateway to provide the ideal solution for monitoring humidity and temperature conditions over time. 

Now you can receive real-time reports from our sensors through Alexa. To get started, simply enable the skill, then follow the instructions to link your SensorPush account and discover your devices.

The Alexa service is available only to accounts that include a SensorPush WiFi Gateway.

For additional information, see our complete product line on amazon.
